position.name: Quarterback
position.writeup: Keeper league quarterbacks are important because these guys can play for a long time

position.name: Running Back
position.writeup: Keeper league RBs are important, though you can always win the waiver lottery

writeUp.body: Not even the first WR taken by Jacksonville in the 2014 Draft (Marquise Lee), Allen Robinson has quickly emerged to become a true WR1. With great size (6'3" 215 lbs) and hops (39 inch vertical), Robinson has established himself as a dominant red zone target averaging almost a touchdown/game through 7 games.  With an insane amount of targets and still only 22 years old, Robinson will anchor your receiving corp for the next decade.
writeUp.author: Greg

position.name: Wide Receiver
position.writeup: Keeper league WRs are similar to RBs
